name: Dark Skyes -- an EPIC brony dating sim (Canceled)
blurb: Brony dating sim with deep RPG elements, 100+ gameplay hours, and gorgeous artwork.

rewards.reward: DARK SKYES ---- Fully DRM-free digital copy of the game for PC, Mac or Linux.... PLUS for being an early supporter, you get any and all future DLC free of charge! THANK YOU!!!
DARK SKYES BONUS ---- You get the game, the DLC, *and* your name in the credits, **AND** our big collection of Kickstarter-only HD pony wallpapers... WOW!

DARK SKYES PLUS ---- Everything listed so far, PLUS digital download of the **KILLER** soundtrack, featuring over 30 sweet songs from a bunch of cool artists, spanning many genres (and yes that includes dubstep and chiptune among other things).

DARK SKYES VISUAL ---- Everything listed, BUT THEN YOU ALSO GET a lushly-illustrated digital art book containing all of our gorgeous concept and promotional artwork... it's beautiful; you will be satisfied.

DARK SKYES ON-SET ---- You get all the contents from Dark Skyes Visual, but that doesn't matter, because you are also getting top-secret access to behind-the-scenes vlogs, sketches, email updates, statistics, and exclusive writer's round-table meetings. You get to see first-hand the blood, sweat, and tears that go into an indie game!

DARK SKYES VOLCANO ---- This reward includes all previously mentioned digital content, but you're gonna need to take a seat and calm down a little bit because this next stuff will freak you out. You're also getting a physical copy of the game with awesome collector's packaging, a *SWEET* poster (randomly selected, you don't know which pony you're gonna get!), and a handwritten thank you note, 'cus you rule!

DARK SKYES SMOKE ---- Dark Skyes Volcano **PLUS** you get a very special reward indeed: a limited-edition pony figure (you choose any from the video), hand-painted and signed on the bottom of the hoof by the developer. Your first name or pony/avatar name will be mentioned by one of the characters in the game, and you will get a PHONE or SKYPE CALL from the mysterious PSYCHOACTIVE CHARM himself... OH MY GOSH.

DARK SKYES ELITE ---- This exclusive package includes everything listed so far, plus an extravagently illustrated, high-resolution, custom poster, featuring you and your favorite pony on a date! You pick the location, the activity, and the mood, and we make the magic happen. You won't regret this ultimate reward!

DARK SKYES SAVIOR ---- Our ultimate reward level comes with everything we got, all rolled into one convenient package for you. All twelve posters, the printed, physical art book, phone call from the developer, signed pony figure, custom video message from one of the female voice-over artists, a piece of memorabilia from the development of the game... this package just contains too much crap to list. SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?! Gosh... can't believe we forgot. YOU WILL ALSO BE WRITTEN INTO THE GAME AS A CHARACTER, WITH CUSTOM ARTWORK BASED ON YOUR REAL APPEARANCE AND INTERESTS! Of course it will have to fit within our pony world... we're not gonna make a pony named John Burton who works at the local pony radiology center doing x-rays, but we will custom-design a pony based on you or your OC. This reward level is truly frightening in how great it is, I can't even believe it's legal!
